snippet.title: SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada – Amasia Investigation Trailer
snippet.description:
Learn how the underground haven of Amasia met its ruin.

As players investigate, they’ll find snippets of the story between the Drifter Alba and his Magus, Ada, and how they were linked to Amasia’s fall. It also introduces the doctor Dothan Kuze who rescued Alba from Amasia's captivity and connected him with Ada.

Get a glimpse into the mysteries that players can unravel during their sorties in SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada.

#SYNDUALITY
